channel.title: Website of RRMaximiliano
channel.description: Recent content on Website of RRMaximiliano

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Adjunct Professor Undergraduate Social and Human EconomyUniversidad Centroamericana, Nicaragua (Teaching Materials) - (Evaluation)

item.title: Bio
item.description: I am originally from Nicaragua. I attended Universidad Centroamericana for my bachelor studies, graduating with honors in applied economics in 2015.

item.title: Data
item.description: I would like to share some datasets that I have created or cleaned that might be helpful for other researchers.

item.title: A completely useless command in Stata
item.description: While I was running a bit more than 5000 regressions in Stata, a friend of mine asked me what I usually do after running and exporting my regressions; well, I had the brilliant and useless idea of creating a command in Stata that mimics the face I make every time my code fails to run.

item.title: Errores en las visualizaciones del Nuevo Diario
item.description: Un punto importante en el análisis de datos es la visualización.

item.title: Presos y presas políticos en Nicaragua
item.description: Desde mi cuenta en twitter, he compartido gráficos y analizado diversos datos sobre la crisis política en Nicaragua.

item.title: Research
item.description: Fields of interest: Development economics • Impact evaluations • Labor market • Violence

item.title: Welcome
item.description: I work as a Research Assistant at The World Bank, Development Impact Evaluation (DIME) unit.
